summary_teim: Solomon Burke, Paul Simon, and the Flamingos are inducted in the 2001 induction ceremony. Includes performances by Paul Simon and the Flamingos.

contents_teim: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke -- Solomon Burke accepts his award -- Graceland (Paul Simon) -- Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon -- Paul Simon accepts his award -- Frankie Valli inducts the Flamingos -- The Flamingos accept their award -- I only have eyes for you (the Flamingos).
